subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Marian Hossa and Ben Eager scored 28 seconds apart in the second period to lead Chicago to a 2-1 victory over Philadelphia in Game 2 of the Stanley Cup finals.
snippet: Marian Hossa and Ben Eager scored 28 seconds apart in the second period to lead Chicago to a 2-1 victory over Philadelphia in Game 2 of the Stanley Cup finals.
